data.title: Martine McCutcheon: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Martine McCutcheon? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Martine McCutcheon's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Martine McCutcheon News

LOVE, ACTUALLY Live In Concert Announces UK Tour

Experience LOVE ACTUALLY LIVE IN CONCERT with a full orchestra on a UK-wide 13-date tour this Christmas season.

The Shows That Made Us: MY FAIR LADY

Whenever I see My Fair Lady, or hear a note from the score, or catch the film, I feel a warm glow pass over me. It truly is 'loverly'.

ESPECIAL: MY FAIR LADY cumple 63 años

Hoy se cumplen 63 años desde que se estrenase MY FAIR LADY, uno de los clasicos de Broadway mas conocidos y con mas influencias en la cultura popular.

Magical Christmas Movie Experience Opens in Manchester

Manchester film fans are promised a festive treat with the announcement of the Magical Christmas Movie Experience opening in the city next month.

Magical Christmas Movie Experience Opens in Manchester

Manchester film fans are promised a festive treat with the announcement of the Magical Christmas Movie Experience opening in the city next month.

ELF - A CHRISTMAS SPECTACULAR Releases 10,000 Extra Tickets Due To Public Demand

Following huge public demand, 10,000 extra tickets have been released for Elf - A Christmas Spectacular starring music legend David Essex and Love Actually star Martine McCutcheon. These tickets are on sale now.

Tickets On Sale Friday for ELF Starring David Essex And Martine McCutcheon

ELF, the hit West End and Broadway musical based on the Hollywood blockbuster movie starring Will Ferrell, is to be supersized into a Christmas spectacular which will tour the UK in December 2018. This extravaganza will play three major arenas this Christmas: Cardiff Motorpoint Arena, Birmingham Genting Arena and Nottingham Motorpoint Arena. Tickets go on-sale on Friday 9 March at 9am.

Gary Lamont: DROPPING THE SOAP Will Tour

Taking in an extensive tour of Scotland join Gary Lamont: Dropping the Soap! opening at Falkirk Town Hall 16 February. It's the starriest show in town with guest appearances from 3 chart-topping popstars and the king of chat himself!

Cineplex Events to Kick Off Flurry of Holiday Fun with Holly Jolly Programming

Cineplex Events invites families to celebrate the joy of the holidays at the movies. Whether it's a yuletide classic film or stage event, this year's Cineplex Events' holiday programming has something for the whole family. Audiences will have a chance to revisit some of the biggest holiday favourites of all time the way they were meant to be seen; on the big screen.

Cineplex Events to Kick Off Flurry of Holiday Fun with Holly Jolly Programming

Cineplex Events invites families to celebrate the joy of the holidays at the movies. Whether it's a yuletide classic film or stage event, this year's Cineplex Events' holiday programming has something for the whole family. Audiences will have a chance to revisit some of the biggest holiday favourites of all time the way they were meant to be seen; on the big screen.

VIDEO: Watch Cast of LOVE ACTUALLY in 'Red Nose Day' Reunion Film

Writer-director Richard Curtis and the cast of his beloved holiday film LOVE ACTUALLY came together again for 'Red Nose Day Actually,' a short film that aired as part of 'The Red Nose Day Special' last night on NBC. Check out the reunion in full below!

3rd Annual RED NOST DAY Raises Over $35 Million for Children In Need

The third annual RED NOST DAY took place today concluding a six-week campaign of activity across the country. The campaign raised at least $35 million to help children in need, and has now raised more than $95 million in its first three years in the U.S.

Hollywood Stars Unite to Change Lives on NBC's RED NOSE DAY SPECIAL, Today

A star-studded cast of Hollywood favorites are coming together to have fun, raise money and change lives in RED NOSE DAY SPECIAL, airing Today, May 25 at 10 p.m. ET on NBC.

Hollywood Stars Unite to Change Lives on NBC's RED NOSE DAY SPECIAL, 5/25

A star-studded cast of Hollywood favorites are coming together to have fun, raise money and change lives in RED NOSE DAY SPECIAL, airing Thursday, May 25 at 10 p.m. ET on NBC.

VIDEO: Hugh Grant & More in Trailer for LOVE ACTUALLY Reunion, Airing on NBC

As previously announced, writer-director Richard Curtis and the cast of his beloved holiday film LOVE ACTUALLY are coming together again for “Red Nose Day Actually,” a short film that will air as part of “The Red Nose Day Special”

First Look - Hugh Grant & More Reunite for LOVE ACTUALLY Short Film Sequel!

As previously reported, writer-director Richard Curtis and the cast of his beloved holiday film LOVE ACTUALLY are reuniting for 'Red Nose Day Actually,' a short film that will air as part of Comic Relief's 'Red Nose Day Special'

Cast of Hit Film LOVE ACTUALLY to Reunite in Short Film for Red Nose Day Special on NBC

Writer-director Richard Curtis and the cast of his beloved holiday film “Love Actually” are coming together again for “Red Nose Day Actually,” a short film that will air as part of Comic Relief's “Red Nose Day Special” May 25 on NBC and March 24's Red Nose Day in the U.K. on BBC1.

BWW Interview: Kerry Ellis On Starring In New Musical MURDER BALLAD

West End megastar Kerry Ellis got her break understudying Martine McCutcheon in My Fair Lady, and has since played leading roles in numerous hit shows, including We Will Rock You, Wicked, Les Miserables, Oliver! and Cats. She's also collaborated with Brian May on several albums and tours. Her next big project is the UK premiere of American musical Murder Ballad, alongside Ramin Karimloo, Victoria Hamilton-Barritt and Norman Bowman. Ellis plays Sara, torn between her poetry student husband and bad-boy bartender lover.

STAGE TUBE: Kerry Ellis and Brian May Perform Live in Verona

Kerry Ellis recently joined Brian May on stage in Verona for a live performance. Check out the full video below!
